Internet of Things.Description: Internet of Things relies on sensors to collect data from the physical world.
Internet of Things leverages cloud computing for data storage, processing, and analysis.
Internet of Things benefits from AI algorithms for intelligent decision-making and automation.
Internet of Things relies on big data analytics to extract valuable insights from large volumes of data.
